titleStmt.title: Campaspe, played beefore the Queenes Maiestie on newyeares day at night, by her Maiesites children, and the children of Paules.
Alexander and Campaspe
titleStmt.author: Lyly, John, 1554?-1606.

notesStmt.note: Written by John Lyly; cf. Baker, D.E. Biog. drama., 1764: v. 1, p. 290.
Reproduction of original in: Dyce Collection, Victoria and Albert Museum.
